q: What documents are required for college admission?
a: You typically need 10th & 12th mark sheets, transfer certificate, ID proof, passport-sized photos, and entrance exam scorecards.
Most college admissions in India start between May and August, but this can vary by state and university.

q: How do I choose the right college?
a: Focus on factors like placements, faculty quality, course curriculum, location, and fee structure.

q: Can I apply for multiple colleges at once?
a: Yes, you can and should apply to multiple colleges to increase your chances of admission.
